name: Daily Nutritional Requirements
description:
Enter you...

  • Gender
  • Age
  • Height
  • Weight
  • and Activity Level

To Get...

  • BMI
  • Calories
  • Carbs
  • Fiber
  • Protein
  • Vitamin C
  • Vitamin K
  • Vitamin D
  • Vitamin B12
  • Calcium
  • and Iron

A school project used for identifying your daily nutrition needs!

Created in Unity and programmed in C#.

Resources:

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK56068/table/summarytables.t4/?report=objec...
  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK545442/table/appJ_tab3/?report=objectonly
  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK56068/table/summarytables.t2/?report=objec...
  • https://www.cdc.gov/nccdphp/dnpao/growthcharts/training/bmiage/page5_2.html
